message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm thinking of taking the majority!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving up too much!

I'm not giving up, I'll give you a small chance to change your mind!

I'm not giving up, I'll give you a last chance to make a deal!
No deal, I'm taking it all!
